qas.question: At what age did Avicenna lose his father?
What modern country did Ibn Sina travel to after the end of the Samanid dynasty?
What is one district that Ibn Sina traveled through in search of more work?
Who did Ibn Sina turn down in order to travel westwards after the Samanid dynasty ended?
How old was Ibn Sina when his mother died?
What dynasty ended in the 10th century?
Who did Ibn Sina head westward with?
Who invited Ibn Sina to travel wesward?
What did Ibn Sina write while in Urgench?
At what age did Avicenna lose his mother?
What modern country did Ibn Sina travel to before the end of the Samanid dynasty?
What is one district that Ibn Sina never traveled through in search of more work?
Who did Ibn Sina turn down in order to travel eastwards after the Samanid dynasty ended?

context: When Ibn Sina was <a0_0><b5_0><b10_0>22<b10_0/><a0_0/> years old<b5_0/>, he lost his father. <a1_0><b11_0>The <b6_0>Samanid dynasty<b11_0/><b6_0/><a1_0/> came to its end in December 1004. Ibn Sina seems to have declined the offers of <a4_0><b7_0><b14_0>Mahmud of Ghazni<b14_0/><b7_0/><a4_0/>, and proceeded westwards to Urgench in modern <a2_0><b12_0>Turkmenistan<b12_0/><a2_0/>, where <b8_0>the vizier<b8_0/>, regarded as a friend of scholars, gave him a small monthly stipend. The pay was small, however, so Ibn Sina wandered from place to place through the districts of <a3_0><b13_0>Nishapur<b13_0/><a3_0/> and Merv to the borders of Khorasan, seeking an opening for his talents. Qabus, the generous ruler of Tabaristan, himself a poet and a scholar, with whom Ibn Sina had expected to find asylum, was on about that date (1012) starved to death by his troops who had revolted. Ibn Sina himself was at this time stricken by a severe illness. Finally, at Gorgan, near the Caspian Sea, Ibn Sina met with a friend, who bought a dwelling near his own house in which Ibn Sina lectured on logic and astronomy. Several of Ibn Sina's treatises were written for this patron; and the commencement of his <b9_0>Canon of Medicine<b9_0/> also dates from his stay in Hyrcania.
